nodes.text: Most Precious Weapon was the second Hasbro/Toys "R" Us–exclusive comic published in 2002.

Count Dooku is meditating in his Solar Sailer. He takes out his lightsaber and remembers his training with Jedi Master Yoda. He contemplates how his former master's advice helped him in his duel with Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi.
